Author: Bumalagirl
Text: What?? That's crazy I'm sure it's something reasonable and completely explainable. Don't beat yourself up for it! Please take care of yourself.

Author: WitchyAyla
Text: I had one miraculous step on the scale at 120.2 just four days ago, after four days fasting and doing a Walgreens "cleanse" since I hadn't pooped in over a week. I felt incredible..... Buuuuut....As of tonight, I'm 131.0. ðŸ˜ž  It's be different if I went out & had a great time, celebrated something, got drunk, ate food I never let myself enjoy, baked wonderful things.... Anything. But I didn't even binge, I swear - I am literally up 10 full pounds eating under 1000/day, hitting 10,000 steps/day. This shit is stupid and bodies are wack and I am so sorry you're upset about it too. ðŸ˜©ðŸ’œ
